description: Blue Talon aka Itto Yamura is a fictional character, and a supervillain in the Marvel Comics universe, first introduced in October 1972, in Daredevil Vol 1 #92, created by Gerry Conway and Gene Colan. A highly trained martial artist and mercenary, he fought with Daredevil.
name: Blue Talon
powers: Wears metal gauntlets that give his hands extra-power
